website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price point for a freshwater reel. You can operate this reel quickly when you need to bring in the line.
pros: triple carbon drag, which should help you smoothly reel in those large catches
Shielded ball bearings means this reel will give you an excellent performance level in both freshwater and saltwater
Doesn't weigh as much as some similarly priced reels
cons: Requires some fine-tuning of the reel's components to ensure maximum performance

customer_reviews.title: When it rains it pours! Piscifun For The Win!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this reel!! It's amazing the performance they put into such a small and lightweight reel. It casts like a dream and reels back in just as well! I would put it up against any of the big names that cost two or three times as much. This reel is as smooth as a hot knife through butter!
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: It’s great feel with a great price tag
customer_reviews.text: Have not took it out yet but have messed with it and seems really smooth and good quality with the right price tag. I think If your looking for a reel and don’t want to drop a lot I say get it I have three okumas and this one stands up with them in smoothness And action
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Your product is excellent! Very smooth. The product levels up to those of Shimano and Daiwa but at an affordable price. Very good quality! Highly recommend and I will definitely buy your products again. Thank you for making your products great yet very good price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little reel...!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have had two full days fishing for trout and reds here in Texas with this reel. I have caught several reds with it, one being twenty three inches long. I have caught and released well more than a hundred trout on this reel in just two days. We hit them just perfect and we're catching one every cast. So far this little reel has performed well with twenty pound braid on it. It is light and well balanced on my Browning rod. For the price this reel has satisfied my needs here so far. I will by this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Grover

customer_reviews.title: Grinds when reeling it.
customer_reviews.text: The reel grinds when reeling it. The handle bolt doesn't go through the whole way and screw to the cap. Instead it threads to the body which constantly comes loose. The bail wire is super thick which sucks. I got this reel for a cheap high speed salt reel for bait fishing. I wish it didn't grind when reeling it because I can live with the handle coming loose all the time and the bail wire.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Piscifun does it again.
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit. This is the third spinning reel that i have bought from Piscifun. And I will hands down say the product is well worth every penny. The reel is butter smooth from the box, braid ready due to the insert and the bail is sturdy and smooth as well. Pisicfun outdoes themselves again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Smooth function seems to be deteriorating
customer_reviews.text: I loved this out of the box, but it seems to be losing the super smooth feel is deteriorating and I haven't used it that much. I'll fish it hard and I may come back and change my review.
customer_reviews.author: MarkM

customer_reviews.title: Liking the pisscifun reels have 3 now working as advertizef
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth casting and retrieving, looks good too. Have not used yet but have Sept fla trip coming up.
customer_reviews.author: jfl65

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cheap reel
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It's smooth & has caught several fish in the 2-3 pound size with no trouble. Haven't taken it to saltwater yet, so I'm not sure how its going to handle that, but been submerged several times in the river & works fine.
customer_reviews.author: James Middleton

customer_reviews.title: No instructions.
customer_reviews.text: No instructions. Not sure if this is the fault of manufacturer or Amazon, as item appeared to be previously returned.
customer_reviews.author: Neil K. Hall

customer_reviews.title: I love this reel
customer_reviews.text: I love this reel!! It's amazing the performance they put into such a small and lightweight reel. It casts like a dream and reels back in just as well! I would put it up against any of the big names that cost two or three times as much. I am not being compensated for this review and i paid full price for my reel. I love it so much though that i will be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Lizard Man

customer_reviews.title: Fast and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight and quick retrieval makes this rare for open face reels.
customer_reviews.author: R. zawacki

customer_reviews.title: Big real, casts ok.
customer_reviews.text: A big reel. The foam handle is an interesting touch. I think I still prefer rubber handles. I can't seem to get the line to load right. It creates a pyramid like stack.
customer_reviews.author: J T

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: reel is awesome after some penn reel oil. I like the handle and the drag is very smooth. It held up perfect with schoolies striped bass
customer_reviews.author: Robin Thennes

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: Love it it a grate reel to own , love the ball Handel very pleased to have this in my arsenal ultra smooth casting and the drag is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Magallanes jr

customer_reviews.title: A novice review.
customer_reviews.text: Binds constantly and my braid line often catches under the drag adjustment knob. I need to send it in for warranty repair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of reel for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and the reel seems great. Surprised at the quality for the price. Smoother than the Penn Spinfisher V I tried. Now will it hold up? We’ll see, but I can buy 4 or 5 for the price of the Penn. Bait shop that spoiled braid on it for me was pretty impressed with it also.
customer_reviews.author: Low Country Fishing

customer_reviews.title: I use a lot of great gear. This one is good. I did a video about the Piscifun Honor Spinning Reel too.
customer_reviews.text: I used the reel for the first time over the weekend. Before that, when I opened the box, the first thing I noticed was how light it was. I have other Lite reels. This one is beautiful and fished as well as some of my most expensive reels, but for much less money. It is easy to adjust. Even though it was windy, I was able to cast weightless Senkos with ease. I hooked a very big fish and the drag was solid. Too bad the fish wrapped up in the Powerpole and the line broke. I was using 15# line. I'm going to respool with 20# line next time I go out.
customer_reviews.author: @basseditor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t fished with a bait caster in a few years, recently just got stationed in Texas, and figured I’ll start fishing again. This reel was a awesome investment, super smooth and easy to get use to. Thanks for the amazing product
customer_reviews.author: Frank Roznos

customer_reviews.title: drag is loud
customer_reviews.text: It may just be me, but I feel that the drag clicker is just extremely loud, and it really got annoying over time, I prefer quieter drag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality spinning reel
customer_reviews.text: Good product. My third Piscifun spinning reel. Really like all three. Will use the Storm for freshwater bass fishing. 20 lb braid spooled very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of fishing gear
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful piece of equipment! Everything worked so smoothly. Would buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I like this reel more than my $250.00 dollar reels. Fishes like a much more high dollar reel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... hundred millimeter carbon fiber other than that real works perfect. I fish California delta and lakes near me
customer_reviews.text: Top-notch quality did change out handle for hundred millimeter carbon fiber other than that real works perfect. I fish California delta and lakes near me.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Seven magnets makes fine tuning casting easy.
customer_reviews.text: Smoothest spool, works great for flipping and pitching light and weightless baits.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Acker

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This may be the best value on the market right now. Very smooth and light.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great reel for the money
customer_reviews.text: 4000 series spinning reel review I've been using the 4000 series from the surf and pier for about a week now and its been great! The drag is a little light for it's size, but adequate. Casts long and the retrieves are quick and smooth. The reel hasn't been set in the sand and it's been rinsed twice daily with freshwater. This started out as a backup reel, but I'm now using it everyday. I hope the performance continues!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Missing part and hoping customer service will come through.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this reel out on a guided fishing trip in Texas and it was fantastic. The settings are precise and the action was smooth and casting was long even in the wind. I ordered it for myself and when it came to me it was missing the magnets that make up the magnetic brake. The particular way in which the magnets were configured was the "draw" for me but the part was missing. Hopefully they're ectifythis problem for me but I am waiting for a response. I'm sure they will fix the problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Reel
customer_reviews.text: This reel is great! Very smooth, casts far, and is very light! The design looks very nice and the breaking system can help you achieve ZERO backlash!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Harrison

customer_reviews.title: ... have had this reel for months and it is super smooth and I have caught tons of big fish ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this reel for months and it is super smooth and I have caught tons of big fish on pickwick lake with it. It is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus M.

product_meta.title: Piscifun Storm 6.2:1 Spinning Reel - High Speed Spin Reel - New 2018 Saltwater Freshwater Fishing Reels - 10+1 Shielded Ball Bearings - Super Affordable!
feature_bullets: SUPER FAST - You will be blown away by its high speed 6.2:1 retrieve rate, paired with smooth, reliable performance of the up 22lbs / 10kg triple carbon drag, it offers ultimate consistence to reduce line break offs even when land trophy.

DOUBLE SEALED DRAG - Piscifun Storm Spinning Reel is with double O-rings sealed drag which gives the reel better water resistance than other reels at this price. A great addition to keep your drag reliable and smooth.

AIR ROTOR DESIGN - The Air Rotor weighs up to 15% less than ordinary rotors. Its unique shape reduces unnecessary weight while distributing stress more evenly throughout the rotor for maximum strength.
SILKY SMOOTH - 10+1 high quality shield saltwater rated ball bearings give you consistent effortless retrieve . You will also benefit from the greatly increased corrosion resistance.

SUPER AFFORDABLE - With a stark, modern appearance, the handsome reels are modestly priced with an abundance of design and engineering features. Such as instant screw in handle, braid ready aluminum spool, double bearings support spool, reinforced anti-corrosion Zinc drive gear, high density EVA knob, aluminum handle and the best price point.
